ing: 2 pounds cooked medium shrimp, peeled and deveined without tail
des: "A 'summery' salad that's hard to resist any time of year. Add a little lemon or vinegar to brighten the flavors, if you like."
ins: Place shrimp in a large mixing bowl with red and green bell peppers, garlic, onion, cilantro, and avocado. Drizzle with olive oil, and season with salt and pepper. Cover, and refrigerate for at least 1 hour to allow flavors to develop. Serve chilled.
